title: Flex with buttons
body:
Using flex with a group of elements that include a button makes the button stretch to fill the height/width of the container. Regulate this by using:

```
 align-self: start; 
```

(or end, center â€“ whichever you prefer) for the button element. This way it will not stretch and can be styled to the perfect size.
excerpt: Tips on styling button elements when using them with display flex.
